name: Class M3 as per AS 3700 adequate (composition e.g. 1 cement, 1 lime, 6 sand)
Check for defective bricks, including any chips or cracks.
All joints & perps are to be filled
Check cavity flashings for correct installation and cleanliness
Check for correct spacing of weep holes. Ensure weep holes are installed in first two courses as per the inhabit design
Weep Holes to be no less than immediately above the flashing, at centers not exceeding 1200mm as per 14522-CAN-FC0001(02)
Provide sliding horizontal ties across joints in unreinforced walls
Check Masonry ties are galvanised steel (Grade Type 316) must be provided at 600mm maximum centre and at 300mm centres along edges of all openings and vertical joints.
Non-load bearing brick walls shall finish 10-20mm short of slab soffit and shall be fastened to the soffit using the specified ties
Check expansion joint frequency is at maximum 6m and expansion joints over construction joints
Door jambs and openings check for plump, level, correct position and height
Check all preps & horizontal joints filled
Work area has been cleaned up and made safe.
ITP has been completed all actions signed off and records referenced have been reviewed and collected and attached.
